column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////A friend of mine has been trying to get me to go here for years
column2: but it wasn't till I got a Lettuce Entertain You gift card that I took the plunge. The hubby
column3: some friends and I decided to go check it out. Half a block away we could already smell the amazing food. We started with a pitcher of peach sangria. Lovely!
